author: lektran
msg: Change the behavior of content.properties' content.upload.always.local.file property so that it will not force LOCAL_FILE if OFBIZ_FILE is specified.  I believe the main intention of the property is to force use of the file system over the db.

author: lektran
msg: Add support for uploading files using dataResourceTypeId OFBIZ_FILE using the attachUploadToDataResource service
